DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of etanercept under usual care settings in patients with PsA treated by rheumatologists.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy of Etanercept in Patients With Psoriatic Arthritis Treated by Rheumatologists
DOC.detailed_description: Non-interventional study: subjects to be selected according to the usual clinical practice of their physician
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of psoriatic arthritis Sepsis or risk for sepsis, Acute infection, Hypersensitivity against Etanercept
